common.name: Name
common.official_website: Official Website of Adv. Anusha – T. Nagar Constituency

home.slogan: Justice for Tamils – Progress for T. Nagar
home.vision_subtitle: A progressive roadmap for T. Nagar constituency, focusing on sustainable development, safety, and empowerment.
home.cta_subtitle: Join us for the change we deserve. Your support is our strength.

about.title: About Adv. Anusha
about.education_desc: Completed B.A. L.L.B (Hons) from prestigious law university, specialized in Constitutional Law.
about.legal_exp_desc: 10+ years of active practice in Madras High Court, advocating for human rights and common labor issues.
about.social_service_desc: Actively involved in free legal aid for marginalized communities and fighting for social justice.
about.political_journey_desc: Representing the noble goals of Naam Tamilar Katchi and Tamil National politics under the leadership of Seeman.
about.vision_tnagar_desc: Committed to making T. Nagar a model constituency with world-class infrastructure and safety.
